name: Fearless women
description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

key_work.title: Fragile females
key_work.last_on_display_place: Australian Centre for the Moving Image
key_work.brief_description: Stunt women and the slapstick comedians of silent cinema were at the forefront of redefining the modern woman, proving that the ‘weaker sex’ could perform daring physical feats just as well as any man.

constellations_primary.name: Fearless women
constellations_primary.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

start.title: Grindhouse
start.creator_credit: Quentin Tarantino, Robert Rodriguez, Ethan Maniquis, Glenn Garland, Sally Menke, Andy Gould, Daniel Frisch, Eli Roth, Elizabeth Avellan, Erica Steinberg, Gabriel Roth, Rob Cotterill, Big Talk Productions, Dimension Films, Eyetronics, Rodriguez International Pictures, The Weinstein Company, Troublemaker Studios, Yer Dead Productions, Martin Martinec, Sarah Dunsworth, Jason Eisener, Jeff Rendell, John Davies and Rob Zombie
start.brief_description: Two full-length feature horror movies written by Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez put together as a two-film feature. Including fake movie trailers in between both movies.

end.title: Gender avengers
end.last_on_display_place: Australian Centre for the Moving Image
end.brief_description: Both Thelma & Louise and Promising Young Woman are landmark feminist films that take aim at gender inequality and challenge the patriarchy. Their centring of female friendship, strength and resilience have made them cultural touchstones.

constellations_primary.name: Gender avengers
constellations_primary.description: Thelma and Louise and Promising Young Woman both celebrate women taking revenge on men who sexually assault them, although victory is temporary as the characters perish because of their choices.

constellations_other.name: Fearless women
constellations_other.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

links.description: Zoë E. Bell’s high-octane stunt work is one of the videos featured in the ‘Taking control’ display in Goddess, where it appears alongside clips that show women fighting back against gender expectations, the justice system and discrimination.

start.title: Fearless: the Hunterwali story
start.creator_credit: Riyad Vinci Wadia and Wadia Movietone
start.brief_description: This documentary traces the life of Australian born actress Mary Evans who performed in numerous Indian films of the 1930s and 1940s under the alluring nom-de-plume Fearless Nadia. With her buxom physique, blonde hair and blue eyes Nadia’s roles typically showed her displaying incredible strength and fortitude in the face of marauding forces and wicked villains. Her roles included “Hunterwali” (1935), “Diamond Queen” (1940), “Jungle Princess” (1942), “Tigress” (1948) and “Jungle Queen” (1956), among others. Nadia challenged the traditionally submissive roles played by women in Indian cinema and performed many amazing and dangerous stunts required for the action and swashbuckling genres in which she extensively worked. J.B.H. Wadia (1901-86), a frequent collaborator of Nadia’s, became a master of adventure films as a successful director and producer along with his brother Homi. Features extensive interviews with Fearless Nadia reminiscing upon her life in the cinema; intrepid stuntman and actor John Cavas (aka Cawas) who worked extensively with Nadia; as well as several other Indian filmmaker contemporaries of Nadia. Numerous clips from Nadia’s oeuvre are shown alongside explanations of dangerous stunt work and co-ordination, and technical developments in cinema. With English subtitles.

constellations_other.name: Fearless women
constellations_other.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

end.title: Wonder Woman
end.creator_credit: Stanley Ralph Ross, Douglas S. Cramer, Bruce Lansbury Productions, Douglas S. Cramer Company and Warner Bros. Television
end.brief_description: With the strength of Hercules, the wisdom of Athena, the speed of Mercury and the beauty of Aphrodite, she’s Wonder Woman. Beautiful Amazon princess Wonder Woman travels to 1940s America disguised as Diana Prince, assistant to handsome but trouble-prone Major Steve Trevor. Using her golden belt, which imbues her with astonishing strength, her bullet-deflecting bracelets, a golden lasso that dispels dishonesty and an invisible supersonic plane, Wonder Woman combats evil.

constellations_other.name: Fearless women
constellations_other.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

links.description: Stunt Double Kitty O’Neal was known for her death defining high falls with one of her most impressive captured as part of Wonder Woman episode “Phantom of the Roller Coaster”. Jumping 12 stories from the Valley Hilton hotel onto an airbag positioned on the pool deck, O’Neal set a new high-fall record in the process, which she broke the following year)

start.title: Captain Marvel
start.creator_credit: David J. Grant, Kevin Feige and Michael Furniss
start.brief_description: Brie Larson stars as Captain Marvel, the first female superhero to take centre stage in the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel explores a previously unseen period in the MCU and made over $1 billion USD at the box office.

constellations_other.name: Superhero special effects
constellations_other.description: VFX talent isn't limited to just one studio that makes superhero blockbusters.

links.description: Originally from New Zealand, Zoë E. Bell has doubled for Cate Blanchett, Uma Thurman and Lucy Lawless to name but a few. Famously, Bell was cast as herself in Quentin Tarantino’s film Death Proof and was filmed clinging to the hood of a speeding 1970 Dodge Challenger.

links.description: The ‘Fragile females’ display features early stuntpeople like the Helen Hazards and Fearless Nadia, a Bollywood superhero who was born Mary Evans in Perth, Australia.

start.title: Wonder Woman
start.creator_credit: Stanley Ralph Ross, Douglas S. Cramer, Bruce Lansbury Productions, Douglas S. Cramer Company and Warner Bros. Television
start.brief_description: With the strength of Hercules, the wisdom of Athena, the speed of Mercury and the beauty of Aphrodite, she’s Wonder Woman. Beautiful Amazon princess Wonder Woman travels to 1940s America disguised as Diana Prince, assistant to handsome but trouble-prone Major Steve Trevor. Using her golden belt, which imbues her with astonishing strength, her bullet-deflecting bracelets, a golden lasso that dispels dishonesty and an invisible supersonic plane, Wonder Woman combats evil.

end.title: Dynasty
end.creator_credit: Ed Ledding, E. Duke Vincent, Elaine Rich, Esther Shapiro and Aaron Spelling Productions
end.brief_description: The saga of a wealthy Denver family in the oil business: Blake Carrington, the patriarch; Krystle, his former secretary and wife; his children: Adam, lost in childhood after a kidnapping; Fallon, pampered and spoiled; Steven, openly gay; and Amanda, hidden from him by his ex-wife, the conniving Alexis. Most of the show features the conflict between 2 large corporations, Blake’s Denver Carrington and Alexis’ ColbyCo.

constellations_other.name: Fearless women
constellations_other.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

links.description: Also performing Wonder Woman’s stunts Jeannie Epper would go on to amass over a hundred film and tv appearances for her stunt work, including the legendary, spectacular, drag-out cat fight between Alexis and Krystle on Dynasty.

start.title: Dynasty
start.creator_credit: Ed Ledding, E. Duke Vincent, Elaine Rich, Esther Shapiro and Aaron Spelling Productions
start.brief_description: The saga of a wealthy Denver family in the oil business: Blake Carrington, the patriarch; Krystle, his former secretary and wife; his children: Adam, lost in childhood after a kidnapping; Fallon, pampered and spoiled; Steven, openly gay; and Amanda, hidden from him by his ex-wife, the conniving Alexis. Most of the show features the conflict between 2 large corporations, Blake’s Denver Carrington and Alexis’ ColbyCo.

end.title: The Matrix Reloaded
end.creator_credit: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski, Kym Barrett, Zach Staenberg, Joel Silver, NPV Entertainment, Silver Pictures, Village Roadshow Pictures, Owen Paterson and Mayumi Arakaki
end.brief_description: Six months after the events depicted in The Matrix, Neo has proved to be a good omen for the free humans, as more and more humans are being freed from the matrix and brought to Zion, the one and only stronghold of the Resistance. Neo himself has discovered his superpowers including super speed, ability to see the codes of the things inside the matrix and a certain degree of pre-cognition. But a nasty piece of news hits the human resistance: 250,000 machine sentinels are digging to Zion and would reach them in 72 hours. As Zion prepares for the ultimate war, Neo, Morpheus and Trinity are advised by the Oracle to find the Keymaker who would help them reach the Source. Meanwhile Neo’s recurrent dreams depicting Trinity’s death have got him worried and as if it was not enough, Agent Smith has somehow escaped deletion, has become more powerful than before and has fixed Neo as his next target.

constellations_other.name: Fearless women
constellations_other.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

links.description: Similarly Debbie Evans has appeared in countless films and television series for her unbelievable stunt work. Especially talented on motorcycle, Evans played Trinity in The Matrix Reloaded as she masterfully zig-zagged through traffic on a Ducati 996 in the film’s famous freeway Chase scene.

start.title: The Matrix Reloaded
start.creator_credit: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski, Kym Barrett, Zach Staenberg, Joel Silver, NPV Entertainment, Silver Pictures, Village Roadshow Pictures, Owen Paterson and Mayumi Arakaki
start.brief_description: Six months after the events depicted in The Matrix, Neo has proved to be a good omen for the free humans, as more and more humans are being freed from the matrix and brought to Zion, the one and only stronghold of the Resistance. constellations_other.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

links.description: Renae Moneymaker has appeared throughout both the Marvel and DC extended universes performing as stunt double to Brie Larson in Captain Marvel amongst many others. Trained in gymnastics and martial arts, Moneymaker has emphasised the possibilities of her role in stunts, “You’re not put in a humanoid box. You can fly,”

start.title: Grindhouse
start.creator_credit: Quentin Tarantino, Robert Rodriguez, Ethan Maniquis, Glenn Garland, Sally Menke, Andy Gould, Daniel Frisch, Eli Roth, Elizabeth Avellan, Erica Steinberg, Gabriel Roth, Rob Cotterill, Big Talk Productions, Dimension Films, Eyetronics, Rodriguez International Pictures, The Weinstein Company, Troublemaker Studios, Yer Dead Productions, Martin Martinec, Sarah Dunsworth, Jason Eisener, Jeff Rendell, John Davies and Rob Zombie

end.title: Once Upon a Time… in Hollywood
end.creator_credit: Quentin Tarantino, Arianne Phillips, Fred Raskin, David Heyman, Shannon McIntosh, Bona Film Group, Columbia Pictures, Heyday Films and Barbara Ling
end.headline_credit: China, United Kingdom and United States of America, 2019
end.brief_description: Los Angeles, 1969. TV star Rick Dalton, a struggling actor specializing in westerns, and stuntman Cliff Booth, his best friend, try to survive in a constantly changing movie industry. Dalton is the neighbor of the young and promising actress and model Sharon Tate, who has just married the prestigious Polish director Roman Polanski…

constellations_other.name: Fearless women
constellations_other.description: Australian born Fearless Nadia would skyrocket to Bollywood fame in her first leading role as Princess Madhuri / the caped crusader herself Hunterwali. Translated in English as a Woman with a whip, Nadia delighted audiences with her daring stunts and circus skills.

links.description: Bell would continue to work with Tarantino in Once Upon a Time in Hollywood, hilariously playing the same role in the film, as she was to complete while making the film - stunt coordinator.
